about.details:
Incorporated in 2009, Shree Tirupati Balaji FIBC Ltd (STBF) is engaged in manufacturing and supply of High Density Polyethylene (HDPE) / Polypropylene (PP) woven sacks, Flexible Intermediate Bulk Container (FIBC).

Company's wide range of products includes, Conductive (Type C) Bags, Type B Bags, UN Certified Bags for Hazardous materials, Form Stable bags/ Q Bags, Funner bags, Tubular FIBC's, Single/Double Loop Bags, Liners-Normal/Conductive/Anti Static liners with formfit, glued, flanged, tabbed, container liners, asbestos bags, BOPP bags/PP Woven bags, Tunnel Lift Bags.

Company's manufacturing unit is situated at SEZ area located at Pithampur, Dist. Dhar, MP. Majority of its sales are from exports to countries like USA, UK, Australia, Germany, Italy, Spain, New Zealand etc. They majorly procure their raw materials by their Group Company, Shree Tirupati Balajee Agro Trading Private Limited.

contactDetails.full_address: Shree Tirupati Balajee FIBC Ltd, Plot No. A.P.-14 Apparel Park, SEZ Phase II, INdustrial Area

faqs.question: What is the Shree Tirupati IPO?
faqs.answer:
Shree Tirupati IPO is a SME IPO of 2700000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹10.80 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹40 per share. The minimum order quantity is 3000.

The IPO opens on September 21, 2017, and closes on September 26, 2017.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Shree Tirupati IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Shree Tirupati IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Shree Tirupati IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Shree Tirupati IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Shree Tirupati IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Shree Tirupati IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Shree Tirupati IPO opens on September 21, 2017 and closes on September 26, 2017.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Shree Tirupati IPO?
faqs.answer: Shree Tirupati IPO lot size is 3000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,20,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Shree Tirupati IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Shree Tirupati IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
